pages.text: One year has passed,How I wish it were all dreams . Now , I'm paralyzed in bed . You will never know how it feels to be $(9)struck by lightning$() . That force got my life back , I'm thanking $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/refining_void_mixture)that force$() for saving me

pages.title: Unidentified Substance
pages.text: The strange thing is that $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/charged_gun_powder)the gunpowder$() I carried is missing , that strange gunpowder disappeared strangly . What's more strange is that $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/refining_void_mixture)the force$() was separated under the lightning strike . I have a crazy idea , $(3)I want to mix it with some other things$()...
